programme.desc: Dez anos aps os acontecimentos de "Monstros", as "Zonas Infectadas" agora se espalharam pelo mundo, e um peloto americano lanado em batalha contra uma nova raa de aliengenas.

programme.title: Um Dia para Viver, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Travis Conrad um assassino profissional designado para matar uma testemunha. Mas, antes que finalizasse o trabalho, Travis morre. Logo em seguida ressuscitado para terminar o servio em 24 horas.

programme.title: Pulse, (2006, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um amigo hacker acidentalmente capta um sinal sem fio misterioso, um grupo de estudantes se une para impedir que um mal terrvel domine o mundo.

programme.title: Hava em Chamas, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um supervulco entra em erupo no Hava, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da populao antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da mfia japonesa suspeita de ser vtima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca, (1993, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Tormenta, (1996, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Em 1961, adolescentes viajam no "Albatroz", um navio-escola com um capito severo.O medo inicial se transforma em respeito, mas uma tragdia pode ameaar essa confiana.

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Caadores de Emoo, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah, um jovem agente do FBI, se infiltra em crculos de surf para desmascarar uma gangue de ladres que, como marca registrada, usam mscaras de presidentes dos Estados Unidos durante seus golpes.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Outubro Negro, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Jornalista americano viaja para Israel com o intuito de investigar a morte de oito fuzileiros navais, vtimas de um ataque terrorista. Mas ele acaba descobrindo que muito mais coisas se escondem por trs do incidente e sua vida passa a correr perigo.

programme.title: A Fria do Protetor, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Billy Wong, policial de Nova Iorque que usa artes marciais, investiga com seu parceiro o sequestro de Laura, filha de um milionrio suspeito de ligao com um traficante de Hong Kong.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: No cruzamento de dois grandes imprios, um simples pastor chamado David se transforma em um poderoso guerreiro e enfrenta um gigante aterrorizante. Uma das batalhas mais lendrias da histria recontada em um conto de coragem e f.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Poder Alm da Vida, (2006, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Dan Millman um atleta que tem dinheiro, mulheres perseguindo-o e aptides para participar das Olimpadas. Mas um encontro com Scrates, um homem que questiona tudo, faz sua viso de mundo mudar completamente.

programme.title: A embaixatriz da repblica de Amel, Maira, alvo de uma tentativa de assassinato por seu prprio tio, o ninja Abdad. Jiraiya e Emiha se juntam para defend-la.

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.

programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos retornam do Reino dos Duelistas e conhecem uma jovem chamada Rebecca, que exige que o av de Yugi lhe devolva o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis! Ela veio reivindicar a carta que o av de Yugi roubou do av dela muitos anos atrs!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Rebecca est enganada em acreditar que o av de Yugi roubou o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis do av dela. Yugi precisa defender o Drago Branco de Olhos Azuis para ensinar a ela que o que conta no o poder das cartas, mas o corao delas.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A junta de diretores desonestos da KaibaCorp prende Kaiba dentro de um jogo de realidade virtual! Mokuba recruta Yugi e Joey para libertar Kaiba desse jogo sem igual, no qual perder equivale a morrer!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misso para resgatar Kaiba continua com uma ajudinha de... Mai? Mas ser que Yugi e seus amigos se adaptaro a um mundo virtual em que as regras e estratgias mudam a toda hora?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi e seus amigos resgatam Kaiba, mas ainda esto presos no jogo! A nica sada requer enfrentar o Drago de Cinco Cabeas, mas Joey, Mokuba e Mai perdem todos os seus pontos de vida no difcil duelo!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um novo aluno, Duke Devlin, derrota Joey em um jogo de Duel Monsters, forando Joey a ser seu servo. Duke fora Joey a usar um uniforme de cachorro e o humilha em pblico, forando Yugi a desafiar Duke para um duelo.
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Em troca da liberdade de Joey, Yugi concorda em desistir de Duel Monsters para sempre se ele perder. Sem conhecer bem as regras, Yugi comea mal. As chances dele no melhoram, e Duke revela que criou Monstros dos Dados-Masmorra com a ajuda de Pegasus!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Depois que o todo-poderoso Orgoth, o Implacvel de Duke deixa toda a esquadra de monstros de Yugi em pedaos, Yugi s tem mais um turno antes de perder todos os seus pontos de vida!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Um cartomante arcano rouba o Enigma do Milnio, e Yugi precisa defend-lo em um duelo para recuper-lo! No entanto, no se trata de um simples advinho. Ele um inimigo familiar e formidvel do Reino dos Duelistas. Ou talvez no?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A misteriosa ameaa que controla Bandit Keith estilhaa o Enigma do Milnio antes de atear fogo na arena de duelos! Ser que Yugi consegue remontar o Enigma do Milnio e salvar o esprito antes que tudo seja engolido pelas chamas?
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yugi descobre que era um fara poderoso que salvou o mundo 5.000 anos atrs e agora deve salv-lo de novo! No meio-tempo, Kaiba testa os poderes de Obelisco, o Atormentador, do Deck dos Deuses Egpcios, contra a fria do Drago Supremo de Olhos Azuis!
programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.desc: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Caada Sangrenta, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Steven Down o nico sobrevivente do exrcito dos EUA na Nicargua por volta de 1986 e foi torturado por um grupo paramilitar mascarado. Ele um homem paranico, problemtico e confuso. Um veterano em busca da verdade.

programme.title: Redeno, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Frente a Frente, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: Fim da Linha, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um guarda de segurana de shopping, e ex-agente federal antidrogas, cruza o caminho de um grande traficante de drogas aps salvar uma mulher que estava em perigo.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: O Jri, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um membro do jri une foras com um "consultor" que tenta manipular o resultado do julgamento.

programme.title: Pitbull: Fora Bruta, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Na Europa Oriental, um jovem convive com a pobreza e a violncia das ruas, at que se junta ao submundo do crime, tornandose pea importante no esquema da mfia. Um policial segue no encalo dele e no vai parar at derrubar toda a rede.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Buscando melhorar a reputao do Cl Nara, um ancio do cl diz para Shikadai desistir de se tornar um ninja e virar um poltico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.
programme.sub-title: Jugo e a Marca da Maldio

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as ordens de Konohamaru, Sumire e o resto da Equipe 15 voltam para relatar a situao, mas no caminho so atacados por um inimigo misterioso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Suigetsu querem ajudar Jugo, mas no conseguem por conta dos sedativos que receberam. Enquanto isso, os pssaros com a Marca da Maldio comeam a se juntar e migrar!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 enviada em uma misso para ajudar a capturar um ladro de joias, mas acaba perdendo o rastro dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki se sente mal e decide passar no centro de pesquisa de Orochimaru. Mitsuki explica a Orochimaru que nunca teve sonhos enquanto dormia, mas que recentemente passou a sonhar.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps alguns dias de misso, Mirai vai nas fontes termais com Tenten, uma ex-aluna de Guy, mas o momento relaxante interrompido quando Guy grita que viu um fantasma.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai sai do hotel com Tatsumi sem falar nada para Kakashi e Guy. Nas fontes termais, Mirai acredita ver Asuma, seu pai, mas h alguma coisa estranha.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O rei da Mirai!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Naruto e Shikamaru debatem sobre o que fazer com os participantes da Prova Chunin que no puderam concluir devido ao ataque dos Otsutsuki. Sasuke retorna e busca por pistas do Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Shikadai como capito, Boruto, Iwabe e Wasabi formam uma equipe especial e saem em busca de uma flor rara que floresce por pouco tempo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos se tornam vidos colecionadores das Cartas Ninja Extremas, mas percebem que ainda no tm a carta de Shino Aburame, seu professor, nem de Rock Lee, o pai de Metal!
programme.sub-title: Guerra por Procurao das Cartas X!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Disfarado de Sukea, Kakashi vai at o Posto de Correios para observar a Equipe 25, cuja misso ajudar na organizao das cartas.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Konohamaru salvam Remon Yoimura de um ataque.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Konohamaru visitam a aldeia de Remon, mas so recebidos com frieza por ela e ficam encucados.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Para resgatar Remon, Konohamaru decide ir atrs de Kankitsu, mas acaba sendo capturado e levado fora de volta para a Aldeia da Folha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Konohamaru e Boruto saem novamente para resgatar Remon, mas descobrem que chegaram tarde demais. Soma libertado e comea a ser ressuscitado.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sasuke manda uma mensagem para a Aldeia da Folha. Boruto consegue bisbilhotar parte da mensagem e descobre que Sasuke far uma parada em determinado local do Pas do Vento.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto consegue encontrar Sasuke, mas v seu mestre desaparecer aps um ataque de Urashiki Otsutsuki.
programme.sub-title: Misso Importante: Proteger A Besta de Uma Cauda!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Liderados por Kankuro, Boruto e Shinki protegem Shukaku e seguem para a Aldeia da Folha, mas so interceptador por marionetes criadas e enviadas pelo Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Shinki discutem e acabam se separando. Ento uma marionete dos Otsutsuki aparece diante de Shinki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Shinki conseguem escapar de Urashiki, mas fugir totalmente dele prova ser um desafio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Urashiki est determinado a tomar o chakra de Shukaku e ataca sem piedade. Boruto e Shinki se unem e liberam os seus jutsus especiais.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.title: Bravura Indmita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dlares um xerife caolho e beberro, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Rastros de dio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmo e a famlia dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoo. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e no terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: On The Job, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na histria real de um escndalo que envolveu presidirios sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para polticos corruptos.

programme.title: A Maldio do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos aps um dos maiores desastres da histria, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural at os destroos do navio original. Mas foras sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaam repetir a histria.

programme.title: Demigod, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a histria aterrorizante do local. No demora at que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporo ameaa destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extino.

programme.title: Megaterremoto, (2022, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Enquanto um terremoto de enorme proporo ameaa atingir a cidade de So Francisco, uma equipe de especialistas em desastres naturais trabalha para salvar o maior nmero de vidas possvel antes que a cidade seja completamente destruda.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Assassinato no Expresso do Inferno, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Os passageiros de um trem so surpreendidos por um assalto que termina em assassinato.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Aps perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporao militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em guas abertas, mas o diretor da priso local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Prisioneiro Espacial, (2020, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando Issac acorda dentro de uma sala estranha, ele descobre que na verdade um prisioneiro, que foi enviado ao espao para iniciar a primeira colnia da Terra fora do mundo como uma nova punio.

programme.title: O feitio da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caa aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratrio e est aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Foras do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histrias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rdio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: A Mmia Ressurge, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes de arqueologia desperta uma mmia antiga. Depois de ficarem presos em um loop temporal, a nica maneira de escaparem derrotar a mmia.

programme.title: Carnivore: Um Lobisomem de Londres, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto tentam reacender seu relacionamento em uma casa de campo remota, Dave e Abi so perseguidos por um segredo aterrorizante

programme.title: A Maldio do Titanic, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: 110 anos aps um dos maiores desastres da histria, Titanic III faz sua viagem inaugural at os destroos do navio original. Mas foras sombrias das profundezas do oceano aterrorizam os tripulantes e ameaam repetir a histria.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubaro Mutante, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um navio do Semestre no Mar afundado por um tubaro de duas cabeas, os sobreviventes fogem para um atol deserto. Mas quando comea a inundar, os aliados no esto mais a salvo das mandbulas duplas do monstro.

programme.title: Pginas da Morte, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando um mdico psiquiatra pesquisa um dirio de meninas para descobrir por que ela assassinou toda a sua famlia, ele comea a cair no mesmo estado de insnia e confuso que a levou a perder a cabea

programme.title: Necrotrio, (2006, Horror)

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: O Espelho Demonaco rouba a energia demonaca de Tetsusaiga. Inuyasha contra-ataca, apesar de sofrer alguns golpes ferozes, mas todos os seus ataques apontados para o Espelho Demonaco acabam sendo tomados por Kanna.

programme.sub-title: OS Sentimentos de Sango, A Deciso de Mirok

programme.title: Sesshoumaru fica furioso quando descobre o segredo por trs do Tenseiga. Totosai tenta convencer Sesshoumaru de que ele ir superar seu pai uma vez que ele seja capaz de abandonar seu apego espada, bem como seu dio a Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshomaru rouba o poder de Tetsusaiga com Tenseiga, fortalecido pela lembrana de Kanna, um fragmento do Mirror Demon. Inuyasha se transforma em sua forma demonaca e tenta atacar, mas Sesshoumaru dispara seu Meido Zangetsuha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: A sacerdotisa Hitomiko perdeu a vida nas mos de Naraku. Mas ela volta vida e tranca Kagome dentro de uma barreira. Ento, o verdadeiro poder espiritual do arco do Monte Azusa se revela!
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e Kaede tentam descobrir o que est bloqueando os poderes de Kagome.

programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Sesshoumaru persegue a m vontade, Magatsuhi. Mas apenas parte de uma armadilha criada por Byakuya dos Sonhos. Magatsuhi encontra Kohaku inconsciente, e ele tenta entregar seu fragmento de Shikon para Naraku.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Naraku est atrs do ltimo fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refm.

programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: O corao de Inuyasha devorado pelo veneno da Jia de Shikon, e ele se transforma em sua forma demonaca. Ele machuca Kagome e a escurido em seu corao toma conta dele.

programme.title: Os poderes espirituais de Kagome so restaurados e a luz divina revivida na Jia Shikon de Naraku. No entanto, Naraku usa isso como um chamariz para atrair Sango em sua armadilha.

programme.title: Naraku tem vivido como um demnio apesar de ter um corao humano. Enquanto lutava contra ele, Kagome pergunta sobre seu verdadeiro desejo.

programme.title: Naraku se dirige para o Poo do Comedor de Ossos e desaparece! Antes de desaparecer, Naraku faz seu ltimo desejo para Kagome, ferido pelas mos de Byakuya, ser engolido em Meido, o caminho para o submundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Quando a ltima pessoa a obter a Jia Shikon faz o nico desejo correto, a jia ser purificada e desaparecer inteiramente deste mundo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha The Final Act BR

programme.title: Anos aps ser selado, Inuyasha, o meio-youkai acordado por uma garota do ensino mdio chamada Agome, que viajou no tempo atraves do poo Come-Ossos.

programme.title: O Retorno do Drago - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Adventure)

programme.title: O Doador de Memrias, (2014, Science fiction)

programme.title: Master Z, The Ip Man Legacy, (2018, Action)

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate, (2022, Action)

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell um f de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Aps seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrar problemas.

programme.title: Aliana Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canad-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Foras Especiais, a ajud-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japo para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instruo progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendrio Yoroi Bitsu, um ba blindado contendo as armas do ltimo Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kug Fu, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Hobson's Choice, (1954, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Widower Henry Hobson is a successful bootmaker and a tyrannical father of three daughters who all want to leave him by getting married, but he refuses because marriage traditions require him to pay out settlements.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit, (1945, Best of British Humor)
programme.desc: A man and his second wife are haunted by the ghost of his first wife.

programme.title: Brief Encounter, (1945, Drama)
programme.desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

programme.title: The High and the Mighty, (1954, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Dan Roman, a veteran pilot haunted by a tragic past. Now relegated to second-incommand cockpit assignments, he finds himself scheduled on a routine Honolulu-to-San Francisco flight one that takes a terrifying turn.

programme.title: Island In The Sky, (1953, Thriller)
programme.desc: Set after World War II, John Wayne plays Dooley, a former army pilot flying transport missions, who is forced to crash-land his fuel-starved plane on a frozen lake after it strays from its course.

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Premingers epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima, (1950, War)
programme.desc: Tough-as-nails career Marine Sergeant John Stryker is greatly disliked by the men of his squad, particularly the combat replacements, for the rigorous training he puts them through.

programme.title: The Quiet Man, (1952, Comedy)
programme.desc: An American ex-boxer returns to Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this film has beautiful scenery and local charm.

programme.title: Killer Elite, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: Windtalkers, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: True story about members of the Navajo tribe who proudly served the U.S. in WW II as code talkers by using their native language as a code to relay information to military leaders.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Crank, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Today is the last day of hit man Chev Chelios' life. He has been given a poison that will kill him if he allows his heart to settle into a normal rhythm. In order to stay alive and take revenge, Chev must keep his adrenaline elevated by any way possible.

programme.title: Crank 2 High Voltage, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: In this high-octane sequel, hitman Chev Chelios (Statham) launches himself on an electrifying chase through Los Angeles in pursuit of the Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart.

programme.title: Shooter, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Horror)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Horror)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Horror)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lakes bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Horror)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Faceless After Dark, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: A new father struggling with fatigue, emotional insecurities, and a failing marriage joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: Day of the Dead, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: 40th Anniversary, (1974, Horror)
programme.desc: Five youths on a weekend getaway fall prey to a depraved family of cannibals in Tobe Hooper's masterpiece of subversive horror, now featuring a 4k digital transfer and all-new surround sound mix supervised by the director.

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2, (1986, Horror)
programme.desc: For a decade, Texas Ranger Lefty Enright (Dennis Hopper) has sought to avenge the brutal murder of his kin by the cannibalistic Sawyer family Leatherface, Chop-Top, The Cook and Grandpa.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 1
programme.desc: Rohan is convinced that Josuke is cheating in their game of Cee-lo when all the dice rolls in his opponents favor. Feeling insulted, Rohan stabs his own finger and swear hell find out how Josuke is cheating in their next round.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Highway Go Go, Part 2
programme.desc: Rohan sacrifices himself to save Josuke from a remote-controlled Stand that sucks nutrients out of its victims. Moved by Rohans act of bravery, Josuke races through town to find and defeat the Stands user before it can kill Rohan.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Cats Love Yoshikage Kira
programme.desc: Shinobu tells her husband, Kosaku, that she saw a stray cat in their basement with a hole in its throat. When Kosaku goes down to take a look, he finds the cat already dead, The next morning, a strange plant sprouts from the spot where the cat was buried.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 1
programme.desc: Yoshihiro Kira spots Kosaku Kawajiri and instantly recognizes that its actually his son, Yoshikage. Meanwhile, Josuke, Okuyasu, and Mikitaka find a strange man living in an abandoned electrical tower.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the electrical tower again to save Mikitaka and defeat Toyohiro Kanedaichi. Meanwhile, Rohan receives a visit from a first-class architect named Masazo Kinoto, whos come to estimate the repair costs to his burnt house.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 3
programme.desc: Rohan finds himself possessed by Masazo Kinotos Stand, Cheap Trap, who tells the manga artist to burn the photos he took of the people in Morioh. Meanwhile, Josuke and Yuya encounter the Stand user responsible for Koichis disappearance.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: July 15th (Thurs), Part 4
programme.desc: Rohan calls over Koichi to help him fight off Cheap Trap, which has attached itself onto Rohans back. Unfortunately, Koichi thinks Rohan is pulling a prank on him and leaves.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 1
programme.desc: Kosaku Kawajiri is forced to kill Hayato after the boy threatens to expose him as a killer. To make matter worse, Kosaku learns from his father, Yoshihiro, that Rohan and the others are coming to investigate the Kawajiri family shortly.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Bites the Dust, Part 2
programme.desc: Yoshikage Kira gains a new ability called Bites the Dust, a bomb that automatically kills anyone who tries to discover Kiras identity through Hayato. Realizing that the only people who could stop Kira are ones with similar powers.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Shining D (Diamond) is Unbreakable, Part 1
programme.desc: Hayatos attempt to kill Kira using Stray Cats air bullet ends in failure. Kira realizes that letting Hayato repeat the same morning is becoming a risk, so he decides to undo Bites the Dust after he sees through Rohans death.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Knov infiltrates the palace. His goal is to place the exits for his ability, the Fourth Dimensional Mansion.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Morel has been chased into an underground church by the lion-type Chimera Ant, Leol.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua have gained new allies and prepare to charge into battle.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: With only one more day remaining until the selection, Gon, Killua and Ikalgo go over their strategy.
programme.sub-title: Taking Stock x And x Taking Action

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Welfin, a wolf-like Chimera Ant, has realized that someone has infiltrated the palace. With his sharp sense of smell, he tracks down the intruders.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters.

programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.desc: Chuck Norris is back in this action-packed martial arts showcase co-starring the legendary Lee Van Cleef. Norris takes on his adoptive brother and a training camp where terrorists are being taught the secret killing techniques of the ninja!

programme.desc: A SFPD undercover narcotics cop aims to avenge his partner's death and destroy a drug-smuggling ring operated by the Chinese Triads.

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade, (1983, Action)
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger throws down his guns to indulge his talents in the martial arts when he meets his match in the leader of a gun-smuggling ring.

programme.desc: American servicemen are still being held captive in Vietnam and it's up to one man to bring them home in this blistering, fast-paced action/adventure starring martial arts superstar Chuck Norris.

programme.title: Missing In Action 2: The Beginning, (1985, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Chuck Norris returns as James Braddock in this action-packed prequel to the original hit film. As war rages in Vietnam, Braddock and his men are captured and imprisoned. With fists and sheer courage, he must become an army of one to save his men.

programme.title: Braddock: Missing In Action III, (1988, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: When Colonel James Braddock (Chuck Norris, "Missing in Action") is told that his wife and 12-year-old son are still alive in Communist Vietnam, he mounts a one-man assault to free themarmed with the latest high-tech firepower, of course!

programme.title: Code of Silence, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: When a stakeout marred by mob interference results in the death of an innocent bystander and a police cover-up, a Chicago detective is forced to adhere to his own personal code of ethics in an effort to rid the Windy City of its Warring crime factions.

programme.title: Invasion U.S.A., (1985, Action)
programme.desc: An army of terrorist mercenaries led by Soviet agent Rostov catches America unprepared and makes it a war zone from sea to shining sea. Only one man can stem the rising tide of violence: retired agent and martial arts expert Matt Hunter.

programme.title: The Delta Force, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Political extremists have taken innocent people hostageand only super-soldiers Chuck Norris, Lee Marvin and The Delta Force can rescue them in this explosive adventure filled with wall-to-wall action! Martin Balsam and Shelley Winters also star.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Enter the world of 1970s TV news, where Ron Burgundy and his loyal Channel 4 News Team are San Diego's #1 rated news source. All is well in their male-dominated world of news until rising star reporter Veronica Corningstone turns it upside down.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Heaven, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A young woman (Kate Hudson) who uses her humor to avoid intimacy has a life-changing visit from her doctor in this divinely funny dramatic comedy. With Whoopi Goldberg and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Georgia Rule, (2007, Screwball)
programme.desc: A troubled young woman is sent to live with her grandmother for the summer, while hiding a secret that could potentially tear her family apart.

programme.title: Heartbreakers, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Max and Page are a mother/daughter con team. Max targets wealthy men and marries them. Page then seduces them while Max "catches" her wayward husbands in the act. Then on to the next mark, posing in a variety of guises to keep one step ahead of the law.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Mrs. Winterbourne, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: This fast-paced comedy follows the story of eighteen-year-old Connie Doyle an expectant mother with no money and an uncertain future.

programme.title: The Beautician and The Beast, (1997, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A New York cosmetologist mistakenly thought to be a science teacher is offered a job to teach the children of an Eastern European dictator.

programme.title: Coherence, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: In this mind-bending sci-fi thriller, 8 friends at a dinner party start experiencing strange and mysterious events on the night a comet is passing close to Earth. Soon it becomes clear that nothing and no one are what they appear.

programme.title: Flight 7500, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: A flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo is rocked by turbulenceand a terrifying force is unleashed in this spine-chilling journey into fear from the director of The Grudge.

programme.title: Assassin Club, (2023, Adventure)
programme.desc: Henry Golding, Sam Neill, and Noomi Rapace star in this action-packed thriller. An elite assassin is given his final contract to kill six people around the world - only to discover the targets are equally skilled assassins hired to kill him.

programme.title: The Rhythm Section, (2020, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Blake Lively and Jude Law star in this action-packed thriller from the producers of James Bond. After finding out her family's death was not an accident, Stephanie (Lively) transforms from victim to assassin, seeking revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young Hannibal moves in with his aunt and begins plotting revenge after his baby sister is killed during World War II. Based on Thomas Harris' novel.

programme.title: The Trust, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two corrupt police officers (Nicolas Cage and Elijah Wood) concoct a plan to rob a bank-style vault that belongs to a high-end heroin dealer.

programme.title: Mermaids, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A sexy and unpredictable single mother of two is a source of constant embarrassment to her confused 15-year-old daughter, who's trying to deal with her own sexual awakening.

programme.title: Trumbo, (2007, Documentary)
programme.desc: Trumbo documents the rise of Dalton Trumbo's career in Hollywood, and his subsequent public humiliation from being among the "Hollywood Ten" blacklisted by the House Un-American Activities Committee in the 1940s for communist associations.

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: Raging Bull, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: RAGING BULL is director Martin Scorsese's lacerating film biography of middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta, who was known during his brief reign as "the Bronx Bull."

programme.title: Downsizing, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.title: The Fighter, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on a true story, two brothers, against all the odds, come together to train for a historic title bout that has the power to reunite their fractured family and give their hard-luck town what it's been waiting for: pride.

programme.title: Cotton Club Encore, (1984, Musical)
programme.desc: Francis Ford Coppola's lavish, 1930s-era epic comes to a vivid new life in this newly remastered and restored version featuring never-before-seen scenes and musical sequences.

programme.title: South Central, (1992, Crime)
programme.desc: Bobby is trapped in a cycle of hatred, incarceration and bloodshed. He is a new man upon his release from prison, but South Central has gone from bad to worse. Now only Bobby can save his son from the violent and doomed future of a gang member.

programme.title: The Hunting Party, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: To cattle baron Brandt Ruger (Gene Hackman), his stunning wife (Candice Bergen) is just one of his possessions. So when a notorious bandit kidnaps her, an enraged Ruger organizes a posse to recover his property dead or alive in the searing western!

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys: Bad Blood, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: In this bloody long-standing feud, two families seek vengeance against each other as they unmercifully attempt to destroy each other's loved ones.

programme.title: Wild Horses, (1985, Western)
programme.desc: An over-the-hill rodeo champion gets fired from his assembly line job in Texas. He and a buddy then decide to head to Wyoming to get a job herding mustangs.

programme.title: The Duel, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger (Liam Hemsworth) investigates a series of murders in a small town and uncovers a dark secret about the town's charismatic leader (Woody Harrelson).

programme.title: Billy the Kid, (2013, Western)
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter kills a member of an outlaw gang, all Hell breaks loose in this shoot-em-up tale of gun smoke and justice in the Old West.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers, (1959, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Constance Towers and William Holden star in this 1863, fact-based story about a Union mission to destroy a railroad junction deep within Confederate territory.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: El Dorado, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum plays to perfection an alcoholic but gutsy sheriff who relentlessly battles the dark side of the wild West, ruthless cattle barons and crooked businessmen.

programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, a martial-arts tournament. Four female rival fighters, an aristocratic warrior, a wrestling superstar, an athlete with a tragic past, and an assassin-for-hire, work together to uncover a secret.

programme.title: ParaNorman, (2012, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Giver, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the beloved young adult novel. A young man (Brenton Thwaites), who lives in a seemingly ideal world, must escape after discovering the deadly truths of his communitys secret past.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: A-X-L, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog created by the military to help protect tomorrow's soldiers. Code named by the scientists who created him, A.X.L. stands for Attack, Exploration, Logistics, and embodies next-generation artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Exploring lost empires and finding priceless treasures... it's all in a day's work for Lara Croft. Though, a secret from her father's past is about to lead Lara to her greatest challenge.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Cradle of Life, (2003, Adventure)
programme.desc: Lara Croft sets out on a quest to save Pandora's box from landing into the wrong hands. Join her as she races through furious hand-to-hand battles, blazing shoot-outs and breathtaking sky-diving escapes to try to save the ancient artifact.

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Red Rocket, (2021, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Mikey Saber (a magnetic Simon Rex) a charismatic con man and washed-up porn star plots his return to the big time from small-town Texas in this wild, fiercely funny portrait of an American hustler and a hometown that barely tolerates him.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: The Master, (2012, Drama)
programme.desc: Haunted by his past, WW-II veteran and drifter Freddie Quell (Joaquin Phoenix) crosses paths with a mysterious movement led by The Master (Phillip Seymour Hoffman) and his wife (Amy Adams).

programme.title: Waiting for Guffman, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Would-be Broadway director Corky St. Clair writes, directs, choreographs and costumes a local show celebrating Blaine, Missouri's 150th anniversary in this hilarious comic spoof.

programme.title: Best In Show, (2000, Mockumentaries)
programme.desc: From the creators of Waiting for Guffman comes a hilarious mock documentary exposing the wondrously diverse dog owners who travel from all over the United States to showcase their four-legged contenders at the prestigious Mayflower Dog Show.

programme.title: A Mighty Wind, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: When folk icon Irving Steinbloom passed away, he left a family of performers he had shepherded to folk stardom. For one night only in New York City's Town Hall, three groups will reunite to celebrate the music that almost made them famous.

programme.title: Crazy Six, (1997, Action)
programme.desc: In a crumbling Europe, powerful mafia families have emerged from the anarchy to vie for control of the lucrative arms trade.

programme.title: King of New York, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: Recently freed from prison, Frank White (Christopher Walken) begins to exterminate the drug lords who rose to power in his absence. When a group of enraged cops declares war on him, Frank's answer is to put a contract out on the cops.

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Requiem for a Dream, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Darren Aronofsky directs Oscar winners Jared Leto, Jennifer Connelly, and Ellen Burstyn in this hypnotic tale about addiction.

programme.title: Mommie Dearest, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: The public Crawford was strong-willed, glamorous and admirable, but Mommie Dearest reveals the private Crawford, the woman desperate to be a mother, adopting her children when she was single and trying to survive in the devastating movie industry.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Fantasy)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Masters Of The Universe, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fantastic exploits of He-Man and his arch rival, the evil Skeletor, are brought to the big screen for the first time in this live-action adventure.

programme.title: Dragonslayer, (1981, Fantasy)
programme.desc: The young wizarding apprentice Galen, is sent to kill a dragon which has been devouring girls from a nearby kingdom. Will his magic be enough to save him?

programme.title: Terrifier 3, (2024, Horror)
programme.desc: Art the Clown is set to unleash chaos on the unsuspecting residents of Miles County as they peacefully drift off to sleep on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and sance parlor.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Winnie-the-Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk, (2015, Thriller)
programme.desc: When a group of cannibal savages kidnaps settlers from the small town of Bright Hope, an unlikely team of gunslingers, led by Sheriff Hunt (Kurt Russell), sets out to bring them home.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and sance parlor.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Terrifier, (2018, Horror)
programme.desc: Art The Clown sets his sights on three young women, along with anyone else that gets in his way.

programme.title: Terrifier 2, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: After being resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to Miles County where he begins to target a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Shes a high school girl from the wrong side of town. Hes the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, its threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful, (1987, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In this story from legendary filmmaker John Hughes, Keith, Watts and Amanda prove that you've got to risk a broken heart in order to find your one true love. This unforgettable romantic comedy has laughs, romance and is truly Some Kind of Wonderful.

programme.title: Secret Admirer, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: On the last day of school before summer vacation, a 16-year-old high school student receives an unsigned love letter, which causes a chain of confusion. The letter continues to fall into the wrong hands, and each person believes it was meant for them.

programme.title: About Last Night, (1986, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Rob Lowe doesn't want to get serious. Demi Moore doesn't want to get used. Together, they're an unforgettable couple in the sexy, contemporary comedy, ABOUT LAST NIGHT. Rating: R

programme.title: St. Elmo's Fire, (1985, Drama)
programme.desc: Seven friends, recent college graduates, are searching for a place in the real world, as they face issues of career and commitment. Rating: R

programme.desc: Shes a high school girl from the wrong side of town. Hes the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, its threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.desc: In this story from legendary filmmaker John Hughes, Keith, Watts and Amanda prove that you've got to risk a broken heart in order to find your one true love. This unforgettable romantic comedy has laughs, romance and is truly Some Kind of Wonderful.

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: Loner Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) enters Officer Candidate School to become a Navy pilot and in thirteen torturous weeks, he learns the importance of discipline, love, and friendship.

programme.title: Urban Cowboy, (1980, Drama)
programme.desc: A West Texas farm boy goes to the big city where he rides a mechanical bull, meets his future wife, and encounters the antagonism of an ex-con

programme.title: Daddy's Home, (2015, Screwball)
programme.desc: Will Ferrell & Mark Wahlberg face off in this Dad vs Step-Dad showdown! Brad (Ferrell) wants to be the best step-dad to his new wife's kids. But when their actual father Dusty (Wahlberg) shows up, the two must go toe-to-toe in this fun family comedy.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2, (2017, Screwball)
programme.desc: When it comes to raising their kids, Dusty (Mark Wahlberg) and Brad (Will Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down. That is, until their dads come to town, putting their newfound partnership to the ultimate test in this hilarious comedy.

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: State Property, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: Beans decides that the only way to grasp the American Dream is to take it. STATE PROPERTY follows Beans and his crew, as they take over the city creating mayhem as their empire builds.

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

programme.title: Four Brothers, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: After their adoptive mother is murdered during a grocery store hold-up, the Mercer bros reunite to take the matter into their own hands. As they track down the killer, they quickly realize that their old ways of doing business have new consequences.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jake Gittes, a private eye, uncovers a web of personal and political scandals while he is hired by a beautiful socialite to investigate her husband's extra marital affair.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Devil in a Blue Dress, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Denzel Washington turns up the heat as a L.A. private eye in this steamy mystery from executive producers Jonathan Demme and Edward Saxon and director Carl Franklin. Washington stars as Ezekiel "Easy" Rawlins. Rated: R

programme.title: From Paris With Love, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: A low-ranking intelligence operative working with the U.S. Ambassador in France takes on more than he bargained for when he partners with a wisecracking, fast-shooting, high-ranking U.S. agent whos been sent to Paris to stop a terrorist attack

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Screwball)
programme.desc: John Travolta is back as Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Be Cool." With an all-star cast that includes Uma Thurman and The Rock, "Be Cool" is the hilarious tale about a gangster-turned-music-mogul...and what it takes to be number one with a bullet!

programme.title: Blow Out, (1981, Thriller)
programme.desc: A Philadelphia sound-effects man witnesses and records a car accident that turns out to be a politically motivated murder.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Warriors, (1979, Thriller)
programme.desc: The armies of the night number 100,000; they outnumber the police 5 to 1; and tonight they're after the Warriors.

programme.title: Masters Of The Universe, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fantastic exploits of He-Man and his arch rival, the evil Skeletor, are brought to the big screen for the first time in this live-action adventure.

programme.title: Get Over It, (2001, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: When a popular high school basketball star gets dumped by his girlfriend, he desperately does anything to get her back. With the help of his best friend's sister, he joins the same school musical as his ex... resulting in an inevitable love triangle.

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of ten Academy Awards including Best Picture, this electrifying musical sets the ageless tragedy of 'Romeo and Juliet' in the slums of 1950s New York and stars Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno, and George Chakiris.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)
