programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Wood, (1999, Romance)
programme.desc: Lots of guys have second thoughts about marriage. Three hours before his wedding, Roland is having third, fourth and fifth thoughts. Good thing hes got buddies Slim and Mike around to help.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Convoy, (1978, Thriller)
programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Von Richthofen And Brown, (1971, Adventure)
programme.desc: Germany's greatest pilot, Baron von Richthofen, is killed in midair by a Canadian, marking the end of a war in which officers were gentlemen and glory and honor reigned.

programme.title: A Bridge Too Far, (1977, War)
programme.desc: With an all-star cast that includes Sean Connery, Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Olivier, Gene Hackman and Robert Redford, this epic WW II drama recreates Operation Market Garden, an ambitious plan to hasten the end of WW II that ended in disaster.

programme.title: Downhill Racer, (1969, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: An ambitious American Skier gains a place on the team competing in Europe.

programme.title: All the President's Men, (1976, Drama)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: The fifth Shadow Rider is unleashed upon Duel Academy, and with an undefeated dueling record and a legendary reputation, he's the most powerful one yetor is he?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: Titan the Shadow Duelist persuades Alexis to duel him to by promising to return her brother's memory is she wins but if she loses, she'll be the one in need of rescue!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: It's Duel Monsters Spirit Day at the Academy, but when someone who looks remarkably like Dark Magician Girl shows up for the annual Costume Duel, Syrus goes gaga.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: A mysterious Gambler shows up at Duel Academy, and he's bent on dueling Alexis to prove his skills and his love?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! GX
programme.desc: When Jaden and the gang go searching for Professor Banner, they find the seventh Shadow Rider instead, and he's even more dangerous than they ever feared.

programme.title: Luffy battles with Kuro on the beach, while the Veggies (with Kaya in tow) flee Jango the Hypnotist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Kaya! The Usopp Pirates' Great Efforts!

programme.title: Kaya rewards the Straw Hat Pirates efforts to save her with a ship to call their own the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Anger Explosion! Kuro vs. Luffy! How it Ends!

programme.title: On the legendary Treasure Island, Luffy and crew encounter strange animals and an even stranger man named Gaimon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: You're the Weird Creature! Gaimon and His Strange Friends!

programme.title: In the past, young Zoro sparred constantly with a girl named Kuina, but he could never claim victory. They vowed that one of them would someday be the worlds greatest swordsman but tragedy intervened.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Three-Sword Style's Past! Zoro and Kuina's Vow!

programme.title: The Straw Hats need a cook among their crew, so they head to a nearby restaurant and meet a passionate Sous Chef named Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Famous Cook! Sanji of the Sea Restaurant!

programme.title: Luffy witnesses the fighting prowess and compassionate nature of the Sous Chef Sanji. The good news: The Going Merrys found a cook! The bad news: He has no intention of joining the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Unwelcome Customer! Sanji's Food and Ghin's Debt!

programme.title: The staff and patrons of the Baratie panic when Don Krieg arrives! The starving pirate begs for nourishment, only to find himself denied. Unable to see a wretch starve, Sanji steps in once again.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Pirate Fleet! Commodore Don Krieg!

programme.title: Don Krieg promises further malice as he returns to his ship, but the threat to the Baratie proves short-lived as an even bigger threat arrives!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Protect Baratie! The Great Pirate, Red Foot Zeff!

programme.title: The Going Merrys been stolen by Nami, and the showdown for possession of the Baratie is delayed. But the actions not dead in the water Zoro challenges Hawk-Eye Mihawk to a duel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hawk-Eye Mihawk! The Great Swordsman Zoro Falls At Sea!

programme.title: The battle begins for possession of the Baratie, with Zeff leading the cooks against Kriegs pirates. Luffy and crew join the fray, but things arent looking too good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadly Foot Technique Bursts Forth! Sanji vs. The Invincible Pearl!

programme.title: Sanji recalls his childhood as an apprentice chef aboard a ship attacked by Red Foot Zeff! When the young Sanji found himself overboard, it was the fearsome captain himself who jumped to the rescue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zeff and Sanji's Dream! The Illusory All Blue!

programme.title: As the battle for Baratie rages on, Luffy is forced to take a drastic course of action, and Ghin debates where his loyalties lie.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cool-headed, Cold-hearted Demon! Pirate Fleet Chief Commander Ghin!

programme.title: The scoundrel Don Krieg appears to have the upper hand in his fight with Luffy. To avoid walking the plank, the rubber man must try a different strategy.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Won't Die! Fierce Battle, Luffy vs. Krieg!

programme.title: The standoff between Luffy and Don Krieg takes a turn in favor of the Straw Hats when their captain focuses his onslaught on his opponents weaponry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Conclusion of the Deadly Battle! A Spear of Blind Determination!

programme.title: With Don Krieg defeated, Luffy tries to convince Sanji to join up with the Straw Hats. The skilled cook is interested, but he has something to prove before moving on.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Set Sail! The Seafaring Cook Sets Off With Luffy!

programme.title: With their culinary concerns in good hands, the Straw Hats set off in search of Nami whos on a collision course with a deadly foe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Worst Man in the Eastern Seas! Fishman Pirate Arlong!

programme.title: Zoro is captured by Fishman Arlong and learns a shocking secret about Nami. Unable to believe his ears, he puts the navigator to the ultimate test.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Witch of Cocoyashi Village! Arlong's Female Leader!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew make their way towards Arlong Park and a showdown with its fishy proprietor. Along the way, they discover a treasure map that raises more questions about Nami.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!

programme.title: A fierce argument over where Namis loyalties lie divides the Straw Hat Pirates and only one things for sure no one is willing to risk their life for a traitor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone's Gathered! Usopp Speaks the Truth About Nami!

programme.title: Namis adopted sister, Nojiko arrives to fill in some details about the skilled mapmakers younger days.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Nojiko continues the story of Namis younger days. Back in the present, Nami gets agonizingly close to a long time goal, but betrayal looms on the horizon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Survive! Mother Bellemere and Nami's Bond!

programme.title: Nezumi comes to confiscate Namis treasure, but whos he working for? More importantly, whos Nami working for, and whats she gonna do with her booty?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rises! Result of the Broken Promise!

programme.title: The Straw Hats faith in Nami is restored, and now its time for a battle royal! Luffy and the gang are determined to make Arlong pay for mistreating their friend.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy in Big Trouble! Fishmen vs. the Luffy Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Arlongs fishermen are locked in a swashbuckling slugfest, but things take a bad turn when Luffy gets trapped beneath the waves.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Submerged! Zoro vs. Hatchan the Octopus!

programme.title: While his friends work to free the captain of the Straw Hats, cowardly Usopp finds himself in a position to shed his yellow streak and make his father proud.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Proud Warriors! Sanji and Usopp's Fierce Battles!

programme.title: Nami must decide between letting Arlong maintain his hold over her, or joining the Straw Hats and leading the oppressed villagers against the tyrant Fishman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy at Full Power! Nami's Determination and the Straw Hat!

programme.title: Arlong better watch his back-fins, because Captain Luffy knows about all the horrible things he did to Nami and it makes his blood boil.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explosion! Fishman Arlong's Fierce Assault From the Sea!

programme.title: Something about Namis former prison gives Luffy an added burst of strength. Hes so moved by her terrible past that he vows to destroy all of Arlong Park!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: End of the Fishman Empire! Nami's My Friend!

programme.title: After a grueling fight, Luffy defeats Arlong and succeeds in destroying his headquarters. The merry marauders enjoy the fruits of victory while Nami makes peace with her turbulent past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Setting Out with a Smile! Farewell, Hometown Cocoyashi Village!

programme.title: Finally, the day has arrived where Luffys face is on an authentic wanted poster! Now there are enemies in hot pursuit as the crew makes waves for Logue Town the final resting place of Gold Roger!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bounty! Straw Hat Luffy Becomes Known to the World!

programme.title: Buggy gets marooned on an island inhabited by unusual creatures and tangles with the islands caretaker, Gaimon. If he is to finally destroy Luffy, Buggy must cast his lot with a mysterious woman.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chase Straw Hat! Little Buggy's Big Adventure!

programme.title: The Buggy Pirates fight each other for the right to take their lost captains place. While theyre busy beating each others brains out, a cannibalistic tribe makes plans to have something special for dinner.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Wait is Over! The Return of Captain Buggy!

programme.title: The Straw Hats arrive at Logue Town, and each crewmember embarks upon a mission of a more personal nature. While his crew shops, Luffy goes in search of sacred ground.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Town of the Beginning and the End! Landfall at Logue Town!

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Annihilation, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A biologist and former solider (Natalie Portman) must lead a mission into a mysterious quarantine zone known as The Shimmer, a beautiful but deadly world of mutated landscapes and creatures that threatens all life on Earth. Also starring Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Riders Of The Whistling Pines, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry believes he has accidentally shot a man, but learns that the guilt lies with men trying to stop a destructive moth infestation. Will modern chemicals be used to save the day, against Gene?

programme.title: Rim Of The Canyon, (1949, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry, playing a dual role as his father and himself, is stranded by thieves who are searching for a stolen $30,000. A schoolteacher aids Gene with his search for the outlaws and the treasure.

programme.title: The Cowboy and the Lady, (1938, Drama)
programme.desc: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.

programme.title: God Forgives, I Don't, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A fast-shooting gunman and an insurance agent track down the murdering robbers of a train hijacking and the stolen money.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Drama)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher whos continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar-winning roles.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in the West, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: The epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

programme.title: Hang 'Em High, (1968, Drama)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood stars in this brazen tale about a rampaging band of vigilantes who make two mistakes: they hang the wrong man and they don't finish the job. Inger Stevens, Pat Hingle, Bruce Dern & Dennis Hopper co-star in this action-packed western.

programme.title: The Way of the Gun, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A pair of bumbling criminals kidnap a woman for ransom money, but they soon realize they've made a huge mistake when they learn she is a surrogate for a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: Walking Tall, (2004, Crime)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: Reindeer Games, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Just one week before Christmas, after serving six years in jail, an ex-con is forced to take part in a deadly casino heist. Ben Affleck, Charlize Theron, and Gary Sinise star in this action-packed crime thriller from director John Frankenheimer.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Drama)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra, (2016)

Call, Michael Flynn, Ileana Huxley Diretor: Michael Winnick

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, Franois Berland, Jeroen Krabb, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Linha de Ao, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

programme.title: O Guardio, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Um policial de Los Angeles voa para o Novo Mxico para trabalhar como guarda-costas para a filha de um poderoso empresrio. Quando gangsters a sequestram, ele os procura para resgat-la e proteg-la. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor. Gneros: Drama Elenco: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis, Stan Collymore, Indira Varma, Heathcote Williams, Hugh Dancy, Terence Harvey, Jan Ch... Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: Caado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, Jos Ziga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Dose dupla, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Denzel Washington, Mark Wahlberg, Paula Patton Diretor: Baltasar Kormkur

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009)
programme.desc: 2009. Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Jeff King

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998)
programme.desc: 1998. Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Steven Berkoff, Nicholas Farrell, Jim Carter, Ana Sofrenovic, Daniel Caltagirone, Joseph Long, Mario ..., Mario Kalli Diretor: Peter MacDonald

programme.title: Jogo Assassino, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. A polcia prende um psicopata que est ligado a vrios sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura ser apenas o incio de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vtimas. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ben Kingsley, Stanley Tucci, Alexandra Daddario, Henry Cavill Diretor: David Raymond

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994)
programme.desc: 1994. Para sair da priso, um criminoso pede a esposa para negociar sua liberdade com um chefe da mfia. Mas quando o plano d errado, o casal tenta fugir para o Mxico. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Alec Baldwin, Kim Basinger, Michael Madsen, James Woods, David Morse, Jennifer Tilly, James Stephens, Richard Farnsworth, Burton Gilliam, Philip Seymo... Diretor: Roger Donaldson

programme.title: Perseguio Mortal, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. O ladro realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psictico, Temple. O plano corre bem at que o ladro descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grvida de Temple, Mia. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vinnie Jones, Lina Lecompte, James Clayton Diretor: James Clayton

programme.title: Justia Letal, (1969)
programme.desc: 1969. A equipe de Kane (Steven Seagal) enfrenta a Nova Esperana da Nao Ariana enquanto trabalha para influenciar o voto do pblico nas eleies municipais. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: O Assassino, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um guarda-costas altamente qualificado, vingando a morte de seu irmo, descobre um crculo de corrupo que se estende aos mais altos nveis da sociedade e do governo. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vinnie Jones, Berik Aitzhanov, Sergey Nikonenko Diretor: Akan Satayev

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos - T01E48

Hell stop at nothing to enact his revenge, even as the world around him starts to explode. Starring Craig Fairbrass, Jamie Foreman, George Russo.

programme.title: The Great British Heist
programme.desc: Three bank robbers take refuge in a local club as the police close in. While the long arm of the law surrounding them outside their sanctuary inside the club is threatened as they start to wonder, are their hostages all that they seem to be? Starring David Brook, Kane Cantell, Richard Harding.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: Sydney Loofes vibrant life takes a tragic turn in November 2017 when she enters the world of online dating and unknowingly crosses paths with Bailey Boswell and Aubrey Trail; as their second date approaches, the couple hatches a sinister plan.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night; but when the weather report comes in for the evening showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A surprise cruise vacation for a husband and wife from Olympia, Washington ends up with one of them going overboard; is it revenge, jealousy or a murderous impulse at sea?

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A professors assistant goes missing at sea near the end of a long voyage; clues to her disappearance are detailed in a diary discovered in her cabin; how did she disappear; does anyone on board know what happened to her?

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: Picky planner Courtney likes hot yoga and hotter men; her tractor-driving mother wont settle for less than farm fresh perfection.

programme.title: Mom vs. Matchmaker
programme.desc: The Matchmaker has her hands full finding a funny, winning date for Jessica to fall in love with.

programme.title: Gaslit by My Husband: The Morgan Metzer Story
programme.desc: After a masked intruder assaults Morgan Metzer in her home, her ex-husband, Rodney, shows up minutes later. Questioned by the authorities, Rodneys story doesnt seem to add up, making him the prime suspect in the attack. Starring Jana Kramer, Austin Nichols, J. Barrett Cooper.

programme.title: The Hands That Feed Us
programme.desc: Exploring the challenges of making a living as a modern Canadian farmer; how they sell their food and how little control they have over the process and price; from small scale to massive debt; from farmers markets to supply chain.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers
programme.desc: A honeymoon cruise goes awry when the bride is allegedly blown off a balcony in the middle of the night; but when the weather report comes in for the evening showing no wind, a murder investigation begins.

programme.title: A Podcast to Die For
programme.desc: When the host of a true-crime podcast stumbles upon an unsolved local murder, she quickly finds herself entangled in a deadly game of cat and mouse that exposes the horrible truth behind the killings. Starring Kate Miner, Matthew MacCaull, Claire Friesen.

programme.title: Staycation

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology

programme.title: Lung Cancer From Asbestos?

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - Family Roots
programme.desc: Whether they like it or not, the places and people everyone comes from define them.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Roasted Chicken Soup For The Soul
programme.desc: Chef Shular hand crafts Chicken and Baby Kale Soup from scratch.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Steak Marsala With Creamy Risotto
programme.desc: Master chef Shular creates the savory steak marsala with risotto classic dish step by step.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Not Your Average Baked Chicken Alfredo
programme.desc: Master chef Shular takes the angst out of preparing classic dishes by teaching technique, tips and tricks.

programme.title: Twisted Dish - Yummy Curry Fried Samosas
programme.desc: Shular makes samosas, the popular North Indian street food snack filled with savory potatoes, peas and curry.

programme.title: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: A woman clashes with her teenage stepdaughter.

programme.title: Love Me or Leave Me
programme.desc: A reckless teenager ditches her infant twins and scoots off to someplace, only to return into their lives years later when they have grown up into adults with issues.

programme.title: Family Time - There Goes the Neighborhood
programme.desc: Anthony, a construction worker, wins $500,000 in the lottery, enabling him to move his family to a middle-class neighborhood.

programme.title: Family Time - No Happy Ending
programme.desc: With the kids spending a few days at the grandparents house, Anthony and Lisa plan a romantic weekend at home.

programme.title: Family Time - The Note
programme.desc: Devin turns into a ladies man after taking advice from Anthony.

programme.title: Family Time - The Tennis Bracelet
programme.desc: After Anthony purchases a diamond tennis bracelet for his mothers 65th birthday, him and Lisa argue about who he loves more.

programme.title: Family Time - When a Womans Fed Up
programme.desc: After being neglectful and spending too much time in his man cave, Anthony worries that Lisa might stray from the marriage.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Bernie Mac, Ladies Man
programme.desc: When Wanda schedules a play date for the children, Bernie delights in playing host to a circle of admiring women.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Saving Bernie Mac
programme.desc: After taking the children to church, Bernie tries to slip out during the sermon to catch a football game on the tube.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Here to Stay
programme.desc: Bernie learns the kids are staying long-term and sets ground rules.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - A Christmas Story
